## Summary

Describe the change, why it matters, and reference any related issues (e.g. `Fixes #123`).

## Testing

- [ ] `pnpm lint`
- [ ] `pnpm typecheck`
- [ ] `pnpm build`
- [ ] Additional checks (Docker build, screenshots, etc.)

Provide logs, screenshots, or reproduction steps if the change affects UI or DX.

## Checklist

- [ ] Documentation updated (README, comments, or inline docs)
- [ ] Changes are scoped to the problem being solved
- [ ] Added/updated tests or examples when behavior changed
- [ ] No secrets or environment values committed
